TopicTitle: moving inside your craft during an IVA...why isn't it a thing?

Articles.Content:
just curious why you can't get up and float around in IVA. would make for some cool space stations if you could move around and interact with stuff internally (think...move to a cupola...move to a robot arm...etc.)

are there mods that do this? is there a reason tied to the game why movable iva isn't possible? just curious

Basically it's a lot of work. Are you ready to put in the work to make it happen?
